import React from "react"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import FormLabel from "react-bootstrap/FormLabel" import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; const RequestForm = (props) => { const [firstName, setFirstName] = React.useState(""); const [lastName, setLastName] = React.useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = React.useState(""); const [subject, setSubject] = React.useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = React.useState(""); return (
First name * Last name * Email address * Address line 1 Address line 2 City State / Province Postal code Country Subject * Message *
); } export default RequestForm;
